description: Try our easy to follow Quinoa Super Food Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Grain salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free,Summer,Halal,Christmas,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Tomato,Dairy free
name: Quinoa Super Food Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 Spanish onion, sliced into fine strips
1 punnet cherry tomatoes, washed and quartered

recipeInstructions.text: Combine your quinoa and 4 cups of water (have another cup for backup, in case it needs a little more liquid, you’ll be able to tell if it gets too claggy) in a pot and add a pinch of salt, then let your quinoa mixture simmer for a further 1015 minutes on a low heat.

When it’s ready the quinoa will grow double in size and it will look like it’s sprouted little tails, then take it off the heat and add the shopped broccoli and mix it through the quinoa, just the heat from the quinoa will start to heat the broccoli, then add your onion, pistachios, grated beetroot, cherry toms and goji berries, and mix well.
Cut your pomegranate in half and with the back of a fork tap the seeds out into the mix and stir through the colourful creation, squeeze any pomegranate juice over the top of the salad too.

Then in a little bowl whisk the olive oil, lemon juice and zest, season the dressing with salt and pepper and pour over the salad. Top the salad off with a few fresh springs of mint. Recipe by Lola Berry.
